content.p: The Appointment of the President and Vice-Chancellor shall be made by a Joint Committee of Council and Senate constituted for this purpose in accordance with Ordinance XI. (amendment approved 4 July 2017) Return to Ordinances list Trent Building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 115 951 5761 fax: +44 115 951 5739 email: registrars@nottingham.ac.uk
